title: NPR One Exclusive: Invisibilia Preview @NPRinvisibilia
contentencoded:
Invisibilia is a series about the invisible forces that shape human behavior. The show interweaves personal stories with scientific research that will make you see your own life differently. It premieres Friday, Jan. 9.

Click here for more info on Invisibilia. And for an exclusive preview, you can listen through NPR One right here.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
